title: Recover Your Money
desc: Responsive WordPress website converted from Figma design using Elementor Pro with modern animations and user-friendly interface. Features include custom forms, payment integration, and mobile optimization.

title: When I Get To Prison
desc: User directory platform with frontend post submission, custom profile pages, and advanced search functionality using ACF and custom coding. Includes user authentication and content management.

title: Fretstraps Video Platform
desc: Video management platform with Vimeo API integration, YouTube-style playlists, and custom registration system with unique access codes. Features video streaming and user progress tracking.

title: Block Guides
desc: Complete WooCommerce solution with custom payment gateway integration, inventory management, and mobile-responsive design. Includes advanced product filtering and checkout optimization.

title: Learning Management System
desc: Custom LMS built with Tutor LMS featuring course management, student progress tracking, and certificate generation. Includes quiz system and instructor dashboard.

title: News Portal Website
desc: Multi-author news website with advanced filtering, social media integration, and SEO optimization. Features include custom post types, author profiles, and newsletter integration.

title: Restaurant Management System
desc: Complete restaurant website with online ordering system, table reservation, menu management, and customer reviews. Integrated with POS systems and delivery APIs.

title: Real Estate Platform
desc: Property listing website with advanced search filters, virtual tours, and agent management system. Features include mortgage calculator and property comparison tools.

title: Healthcare Appointment System
desc: Medical practice website with online appointment booking, patient portal, and doctor management system. HIPAA compliant with secure patient data handling.
